entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -35.1°C

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 44.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 44. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
